sections.title: Overview
content: Provide a clear, concise overview of the application process. This should give readers a quick understanding of what the process accomplishes.

alert.title: Before You Begin
alert.content: List any prerequisites, permissions, or preparations needed before starting the solution.

list: First step descriptionProvide detailed instructions for the first step. Include any specific settings, locations, or commands.
Second step descriptionContinue with the next step. Use clear, actionable language.
Third step descriptionAdd more steps as needed. Each step should be atomic and clear.

alert.title: Important Note
alert.content: Include any warnings, cautions, or important considerations that users should be aware of.

sections.title: Code Example
content: If your solution involves code, scripts, or command-line instructions, include them here:

list: Link to related knowledge base articles

alert.title: Success Indicators
alert.content: Describe how users can verify that the solution worked correctly:Expected system behaviorSpecific confirmation messagesPerformance improvements
